org.qiweb.filters

Annotation Type HSTS


  • @FilterWith(value=HSTS.Filter.class)
 @Target(value={METHOD,TYPE})
 @Retention(value=RUNTIME)
 @Inherited
 @Documented
public @interface HSTS
    HTTP Strict-Transport-Security Annotation.

    RFC6797.

    Can I use?

    • Optional Element Summary

      Optional Elements  
      Modifier and Type Optional Element and Description
      boolean includeSubDomains
      includeSubDomains directive.
      long maxAge
      max-age directive, in seconds.

    • Element Detail

      • maxAge

        public abstract long maxAge
        max-age directive, in seconds.

        Don't set this to a too high value in order to prevent privacy issues for your users. See this security.stackexchange answer and The double edged sword of HSTS persistence and privacy for tremendous details.

        Default to qiweb.filters.hsts.max_age configuration property value.

        Returns:
        The max-age directive value, in seconds
        Default:
        -1L

      • includeSubDomains

        public abstract boolean includeSubDomains
        includeSubDomains directive.

        Default to qiweb.filters.hsts.include_sub_domains configuration property value.

        Returns:
        TRUE if the includeSubDomains directive should be included, FALSE otherwise. Defaults to FALSE.
        Default:
        false
